Text: Gee, thanks AoZ I've been waiting a while for this torrent. Thanks a bunch!
I'm just wondering when saga 4 will be up, I've been wanting to see what happens.
hey sorry bout the wait, ive been havin quite a lot of work recently, it should be up within a week or 2
Oh, OK thanks, that's not long at all, thanks for answering my question and for these great torrents. :D

Downloaded, and the quality of both video and audio are the same as the other two sagas.
This saga, unfortunately, had maybe two or three episodes that lagged a bit at some parts. They were among the earlier episodes, but the lag wasn't very noticeable and only lasted a few seconds.
A very nice download, well worth it. Thank you, AoZ.
